Comfort and Hospitality at Red Roof Inn North Charleston Coliseum

Red Roof Inn North Charleston Coliseum offers a budget-friendly stay near Charleston International Airport, providing easy access to the Charleston Area Convention Center and the city's historic charm. Whether you're here for business, a convention, or exploring the Lowcountry, Red Roof Inn North Charleston Coliseum delivers dependable comfort and value.

Red Roof Inn North Charleston Coliseum is a welcoming and affordable choice for guests seeking convenience and reliable service near Charleston's top destinations. With friendly hospitality and essential amenities, we make every stay simple and stress-free.

Our hotel is 100% smoke free. Guests can expect a clean, comfortable stay with the basics you need, including free Verified Wi-Fi, a free expanded cable package featuring HBO, and paid guest laundry. We are proud to be a pet-friendly hotel, so your four-legged companion is always welcome.

Our North Charleston, SC hotel is located near Strayer University, the Charleston Area Convention Center, and the Charleston Air Force Base, as well as several popular attractions, including Riverfront Park, historic downtown Charleston, and Magnolia Plantation & Gardens, all within a short drive.
The hotel is currently offering limited cleaning for stayover guests. Please see front desk upon arrival for details. More
